ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: This course covers how technology has been leveraged by militaries both offensively and defensively using a number of historical and contemporary examples.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: This course was very engaging and allowed the student to express their ideas and opinions on a wide variety of subjects. The class was well organized and the instructor did a fantastic job in keeping the class engaged. I also enjoyed the ad hoc structure of the course with the instructor curtailing the schedule and material to the class' interests and needs such as adding material on signal intelligence gathering as well as having an in-class discussion on the progress of our term papers therefore allowing us to use both the class and the instructor to help formulate ideas.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would course to any student with an interest in military affairs or history as these subjects often go hand in hand.
